div.p: I think that’s the hardest part is meeting your deadlines and prioritising your ideas you know choosing the most important, that’s my biggest
pet peeve is not being able to get all my ideas in the same project, sometimes I have to let them go... Yeah so I’d probably say that was the hardest bit.
It’s got to be the sort of bureaucratic side of it so when I worked at the Council you’ve got to get permission from loads of people
in order to have that design work and sometimes the conceptual idea gets lost in the process in order to meet Building Regs or like the
Conservation Committee don’t like a certain design because it’s not a certain brick or something like that, it’s sometimes a bit too pedantic...
Is pedantic the right word? Yeah I think pedantic, it can be very pedantic, architecture, so that’s probably the most annoying part of what I do.
